item.title: Micron launches new memory chips to keep up with AI processing
item.description: Micron announced its first 1y (1-gamma) DDR5 memory chip samples this week, and it says this is part of its contribution to systems that keep up with ...

item.title: 2025 has already brought us the most performant AI ever: What can we do with these supercharged capabilities (and what’s next)?
item.description: From OpenAI's 'Deep Research' to DeepMind's 'AI co-scientist,' next-gen AI is smarter and astoundingly capable.

item.title: Weak cyber defenses are exposing critical infrastructure — how enterprises can proactively thwart cunning attackers to protect us all
item.description: If businesses fail to up their cybersecurity game, the systems everyone relies on could face serious and devastating disruptions.

item.title: GPT-4.5 for enterprise: Do its accuracy and knowledge justify the cost?
item.description: The price of GPT-4.5 is very steep. But it doesn't mean that it's a failure (or that it will always be so expensive).

item.title: Semantic understanding, not just vectors: How Intuit’s data architecture powers agentic AI with measurable ROI
item.description: From automation to autonomy: How Intuit's 'done for you' agentic AI architecture drives concrete business outcomes.
